js/tiny_mce/plugins/paste/js/pasteword.js
  1.  1  tinyMCEPopup.requireLangPack();
  2.  2  
  3.  3  var PasteWordDialog = {
  4.  4   init : function() {
  5.  5   var ed = tinyMCEPopup.editor, el = document.getElementById('iframecontainer'), ifr, doc, css, cssHTML = '';
  6.  6  
  7.  7   // Create iframe
  8.  8   el.innerHTML = '<iframe id="iframe" src="javascript:\'\';" frameBorder="0" style="border: 1px solid gray"></iframe>';
  9.  9   ifr = document.getElementById('iframe');
  10. 10   doc = ifr.contentWindow.document;
  11. 11  
  12. 12   // Force absolute CSS urls
  13. 13   css = [ed.baseURI.toAbsolute("themes/" + ed.settings.theme + "/skins/" + ed.settings.skin + "/content.css")];
  14. 14   css = css.concat(tinymce.explode(ed.settings.content_css) || []);
  15. 15   tinymce.each(css, function(u) {
  16. 16   cssHTML += '<link href="' + ed.documentBaseURI.toAbsolute('' + u) + '" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />';
  17. 17   });
  18. 18  
  19. 19   // Write content into iframe
  20. 20   doc.open();
  21. 21   doc.write('<html><head>' + cssHTML + '</head><body class="mceContentBody" spellcheck="false"></body></html>');
  22. 22   doc.close();
  23. 23  
  24. 24   doc.designMode = 'on';
  25. 25   this.resize();
  26. 26  
  27. 27   window.setTimeout(function() {
  28. 28   ifr.contentWindow.focus();
  29. 29   }, 10);
  30. 30   },
  31. 31  
  32. 32   insert : function() {
  33. 33   var h = document.getElementById('iframe').contentWindow.document.body.innerHTML;
  34. 34  
  35. 35   tinyMCEPopup.editor.execCommand('mceInsertClipboardContent', false, {content : h, wordContent : true});
  36. 36   tinyMCEPopup.close();
  37. 37   },
  38. 38  
  39. 39   resize : function() {
  40. 40   var vp = tinyMCEPopup.dom.getViewPort(window), el;
  41. 41  
  42. 42   el = document.getElementById('iframe');
  43. 43  
  44. 44   if (el) {
  45. 45   el.style.width = (vp.w - 20) + 'px';
  46. 46   el.style.height = (vp.h - 90) + 'px';
  47. 47   }
  48. 48   }
  49. 49  };
  50. 50  
  51. 51  tinyMCEPopup.onInit.add(PasteWordDialog.init, PasteWordDialog);
